name: Neon Knights
description:
This game was a class project for Casual Game Production at the University of Central Florida in the spring of 2018.  It was originally designed to be used with the Limbitless Solutions wheelchair in an effort to help those with ALS to become familiar with the wheelchair controls before using it in their everyday lives. However, there are also Arcade Machine and Windows PC versions of the game which are available for download here.

Gameplay

Neon Knights is a Futuristic Hover-car racing game.  Mechanically, it handles similarly to your standard kart racer game along with having vivid lights and sharp 3-D  visuals. Race through a lively and colorful futuristic cityscape, compete against opponents, and go for the gold!
